page.title: 18RECREATION & LEISURE
page.content: Most people belong to at least 1{club in Denton,all of whom meet on a regular basis & also arrange outings. For the{sports}fans there are bowls (played on a special mat inside the village hall),tennis on 2 courts and badminton.There is a weekly Keep Fit class. The Mother & Toddler Group cater for mums & children up to 5yrs, the Youth Club for{children}aged 7-16, the Womens Institute for women of all ages over 16,and the Friendly Club for those of retirement age.A specialist club,held on the old airfield,is the East Anglian Air Sports who offer flying lessons in small single-engine airplanes & microlite aircraft. All these have{committees}who run the club.Other committees are The Village Hall,Playing Field,and Community Bus. Most people enjoy gardening,many people grow vegetables to eat.
